spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sehad is an 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Sehad has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Arcane Abjuration (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
entries: Sehad abjures otherworldly creatures. One celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend of Sehad's choice within 30 feet of him must succeed a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from Sehad as it can, and it can't willingly end its move in a space within 30 feet of Sehad. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the {@action Dash} action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, then the creature can use the {@action Dodge} action.
If the creature's challenge rating is equal to or less than 1, it is banished for 1 minute (as in the {@spell banishment} spell, no concentration required) if it isn't on its plane of origin
{@bold {@italic Purpose.}} Serve as a quest objective and instructor to players.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I wish for Cormyr to know the blessings of Mystra. (Hope)
